content.raw:
there are 2 problems I’m aware of:

1. ogre 2.1 debs conflicts with 1.9 debs so the two cannot be installed from apt
2. you can still install them from source and ign-cmake find modules should be able to correctly detect the ogre versions and let ign-rendering build both render engine plugins. However, the two can not be loaded at the same time as they will cause runtime errors - so we lose the ability to switch between an ogre 1.9 scene and an ogre 2.1 scene at runtime.
